column8:
Jimi Hendrix Sunshine of Your Love t shirt

Jimi Hendrix admired many British musicians notably Steve Winwood and Dave Mason - who both played on Hendrix's Electric Ladyland album - and less obviously Jack Bruce and Ginger Baker , Cream 's rhythm section. Hendrix sat in on a Cream performance and would likely have done so more often had there been less tension in the band. Cream broke up playing their last concert at the Albert Hall in 26th November 1968.

In 1969 Hendrix and the Experience were playing live on a music magazine show fronted by Lulu . They played Voodoo Chile and Hey Joe. A few minutes into Hey Joe Hendrix stopped playing and singing saying something like that is enough of this rubbish. He went on to mention Cream's break up, Clapton, Bruce and Baker before launching into Sunshine of Your Love. This was extraordinarily generous and spontaneous.  If you listen carefully you can hear Hendrix speculate that the producers of the show might interupt the transmission.  Celebrate a musician unusual in every way, wear our Jimi Hendrix T shirts.
column21: Celebrate a musician unusual in every way, wear our Jimi Hendrix T shirt.
